contentrichtext.text: A [[magic lantern]] is an early type of image projector, an ancestor of the modern slide projector. '''Magic lantern''' may also refer to: ==Entertainment== *''The Magic Lantern'', a book by [[Timothy Garton Ash]] recounting the fall of communism throughout Eastern Europe *''[[The Punch and Judy Murders]]'', a book, also published under the title ''The Magic Lantern Murders'' *[[The Magic Lanterns]], a 1960s music group *''Magic Lantern'', an album by [[Haymarket Square (band)]] *''Magic Lantern'', an alternate version of the comic book hero [[Green Lantern]] ===Theater=== *Magic Lantern, a street theater and puppetry group in the 1970s, formed by [[Taffy Thomas]] *[[Laterna Magika]], a Czech theater *[[Magic Lantern (theater)]], a theater in Prague which served as the headquarters for the Velvet Revolution reform movement *[[Rainbow and Magic Lantern Cinemas]], in Canada ==Software== *[[Magic Lantern (firmware)]], enhancements to Canon digital SLRs *[[Magic Lantern (software)]], FBI keylogging and surveillance software ==Other uses== *Magic Lantern Guides, series of aftermarket in-depth operating manuals for cameras *Magic Lantern Deployment Contingency, a US Navy laser-based [[naval mine|mine]] hunting system ==See also== *[[Laterna magica (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
